item.title: Tidy Tuesday Functions
item.description: Week Data Set Lesson Function Package 2019-10-29 Squirrels API keys to environment variables Sys.getenv base 2019-10-29 Squirrels Source Google map layer get_googlempap ggmap 2019-10-29 Squirrels Chart clones by variable facet_wrap ggplot2 2019-10-29 Squirrels Convert string to title case str_to_title stringr 2019-10-15 Vehicle MPH Regression estimates tidy broom 2019-10-15 Vehicle MPH Import image read_impage magick 2019-10-15 Vehicle MPH Image to grob rasterGrob grid 2019-10-15 Vehicle MPH Add image to chart annotation_custom ggplot2 2019-09-03 Moore’s Law Calculate loess regression loess stats 2019-09-03 Moore’s Law Regression fit make tidy augment broom 2019-09-03 Moore’s Law Data frame from scratch tibble tibble 2019-09-03 Moore’s Law Title over full plot plot.

item.title: Favorite links
item.description: R Programming Fundamentals “R for Data Science” — seminal Tidyverse primer by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund “Learning R Step by Step” - hard copy book by Richard Cotton Statistics with R — online Duke courses via Coursera R Programming — online Johns Hopkins class via Coursera Data Cleaning with R — online Johns Hopkins class via Coursera Tidyverse Top 50 ggplot visualizations Ggplot2 extensions Online Community R for Data Science (R4DS) Online Learning Community Tidy Tuesday - data sets to practice Tidyverse concepts Tidy Tuesday Rocks - R Shiny compilation of Tidy Tuesday submissions Data Visualization Fundamentals “Fundamentals of Data Visualization” — free online book by Claus Wilke.

A collection of data visualizations I have built for fun using the ggplot2 package in the [R] (https://www.r-project.org/about.html)programming language. All visualizations are the result of the code without any post-processing. TidyTuesday #TidyTuesday is a weekly data project aimed at the R ecosystem and tidyverse package bundle to source, wrangle, explore and visualize the data set provided by the R4DS Online Learning Community.
